question.title: can skywalking OAP receive opentelemetry trace
question.body:
I have a question when using opentelemetry and skywalking. In java project, use opentelemetry to generate trace and span infomation, then I want to collect these trace to skywalking aop to analysis and display. I have deploy skywalking version is 10.2.0

opentelemetry-->skywalking oap directly, no other collector.Config.oltpEndPoint=http://192.168.163.128:11800

but it seems like failed, no error in java program, no trace in skywalking.

what happend about it, how to figure it out.

I have already upgrade skywalking to 10.2.0, and find refer to github issue, and ask many questions to chatgpt

my code is below:


    public class Main {

    private static final int MAX_PACKET_LEN = 65536;
    private static Tracer tracer;

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Config.readConfig(args);
        initOpenTelemetry();
        while (true) {
            try {
                Span span = tracer.spanBuilder("winDivertUdpHandler")
                        .setAttribute("network.protocol", "udp")
                        .startSpan();
                try (Scope scope = span.makeCurrent()) {
                    System.out.println("traceId: " + span.getSpanContext().getTraceId() + ", spanId: "
                            + span.getSpanContext().getSpanId() + ", flag: " + span.getSpanContext().getTraceFlags());
                    dosomething();
                    
                } finally {
                    span.end();
                }


            } catch (Exception e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

    private static void initOpenTelemetry() {
        OtlpGrpcSpanExporter exporter = OtlpGrpcSpanExporter.builder()
                .setEndpoint("http://192.168.163.128:11800")
                .build();

        // Resource（service.name）
        Resource resource = Resource.getDefault()
                .merge(Resource.create(Attributes.of(AttributeKey.stringKey("service.name"), "udp-sidecar")));

        SdkTracerProvider tracerProvider = SdkTracerProvider.builder()
                .setResource(resource)
                .addSpanProcessor(BatchSpanProcessor.builder(exporter).build())
                .build();

        OpenTelemetrySdk.builder()
                .setTracerProvider(tracerProvider)
                .setPropagators(ContextPropagators.create(W3CTraceContextPropagator.getInstance()))
                .buildAndRegisterGlobal();

        tracer = GlobalOpenTelemetry.getTracer("udp-sidecar");
        System.out.println("OpenTelemetry initialized, OTLP endpoint = " + Config.oltpEndPoint);
    }


}
